scripts.init: npm run init:server & npm run init:client
scripts.libs: cd sockets-shared && npm i && npm run inject && cd ..
scripts.client: npm run libs && docker-compose -p spotify-client --profile client up --build
scripts.server: npm run libs && docker-compose -p spotify-server --profile server up --build
scripts.socket-server: npm run libs && docker-compose -p spotify-socket-server --profile socket-server up --build
scripts.dev: npm run libs && docker-compose -p spotify-dev --profile dev up --build
scripts.prod: npm run libs && docker-compose -p spotify-prod --profile prod up --build
